post.file:
LoadModule wsgi_module /opt/python/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mod_wsgi/server/mod_wsgi-py27.so
WSGIScriptAlias /nucleus /opt/python/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nucleus_service/nucleus/wsgi.py WSGIApplicationGroup %{GLOBAL} WSGIDaemonProcess nucleus_service_app python-path=/opt/python/lib/site-packages/django:/opt/python/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nucleus_service WSGISocketPrefix /var/run/wsgi WSGIProcessGroup nucleus_service_app WSGIPassAuthorization On
<Directory /opt/python/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nucleus_service> <Files wsgi.py> Options All Require all granted </Files> </Directory>
# The Django static files Alias /static/ /var/www/html/static/ <Location /static> Order deny,allow Allow from all </Location>
